article.title: Glowlink Wins Contract from FAA for Satellite Carrier Monitoring System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Glowlink has received a contract by the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) for a satellite carrier monitoring system (CMS) to manage FAA satellite communications traffic in Alaska and the continental United States. Under the contract, Glowlink will deliver, install and integrate the CMS with the FAA's existing satellite network management infrastructure as well as provide training.
